hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE '\b(ssh|scp|rsync)\b.*@'; then echo 'BLOCKED: SSH connections (ssh, scp, rsync) to remote hosts are not allowed' >&2; exit 2; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE 'ansible-vault\s+(view|decrypt)\b'; then echo 'BLOCKED: ansible-vault view/decrypt is not allowed — use ansible-vault edit instead' >&2; exit 2; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE 'cat\s+.*(\.aws/credentials|\.aws/config|\.kube/config|\.docker/config\.json|\.boto|\.s3cfg|\.netrc|\.git-credentials|\.npmrc|vault/password|1pass\.txt|github\.txt)'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Reading credential/secret files via shell is not allowed' >&2; exit 2; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE 'git\s+(push\s+--force|push\s+-f|reset\s+--hard|clean\s+-f)'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Destructive git commands (force push, reset --hard, clean -f) are not allowed' >&2; exit 2; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE 'git\s+push\b' && echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE '\b(main|master)\b'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Pushing directly to main/master is not allowed' >&2; exit 2; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE 'rm\s+-[a-z]*r[a-z]*f' && echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE '\s/(\s|$)|\s/(home|mnt|etc|usr|var)(\s|/)'; then echo 'BLOCKED: rm -rf on broad system paths is not allowed' >&2; exit 2; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE '(curl|wget)\s.*\|\s*(ba)?sh'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Pipe-to-shell (curl|bash) is not allowed' >&2; exit 2; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE 'chmod\s+777'; then echo 'BLOCKED: chmod 777 sets world-writable permissions — use a safer mode' >&2; exit 2; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE '\b(DROP\s+(TABLE|DATABASE|SCHEMA)|TRUNCATE\s+TABLE|DELETE\s+FROM\s+\S+\s*;)'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Destructive database operations (DROP, TRUNCATE, unfiltered DELETE) are not allowed' >&2; exit 2; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE 'docker\s+run.*--(privileged|net=host)|docker\s+run.*-v\s+/:/'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Docker privileged mode, host networking, and root volume mounts are not allowed' >&2; exit 2; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE '(terraform|pulumi|cdktf)\s+destroy'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Infrastructure destroy commands are not allowed' >&2; exit 2; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qiE '(pip|pip3)\s+install\s+https?://|npm\s+install\s+https?://|yarn\s+add\s+https?://'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Installing packages from arbitrary URLs is not allowed — use a registry' >&2; exit 2; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -qiE '(\.aws/(credentials|config)|credentials\.json|service.account\.json|\.kube/config|\.docker/config\.json|\.boto|\.s3cfg|\.netrc|\.git-credentials|\.npmrc|token\.json)'; then echo 'BLOCKED: Reading cloud/service credential files is not allowed' >&2; exit 2; fi
FILE="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [ -n "$FILE" ] && echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|vue|json|css|scss|md)$'; then prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

FILE="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [ -n "$FILE" ] && echo "$FILE" | grep -qiE 'CLAUDE\.md$'; then LINES=$(wc -l < "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || echo 0); if [ "$LINES" -gt 150 ]; then echo "CLAUDE.md is $LINES lines (target: <150). Consider moving reference data to skills or MEMORY.md." >&2; fi; fi
